title: New from TEFF: Burgundica by Gerrit Noordzij
content:
Submitted by [pvanderlaan](http://web.archive.org/web/20110413113011/http:/typophile.com/user/17208 "View user profile.") : 20.Jan.2009 2.15am 

We’re happy to announce a new typeface: **Burgundica**.

Originally created in 1983, this remarkable design by Gerrit Noordzij is now generally available. It comes in the OpenType and PS Type 1 format and consists of four weights.

Burgundica is a Fraktur (“broken script”) with strong calligraphic roots.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110413113011im_/http:/typophile.com/files/burgundica_5002.gif)

To see what the designer has to say about Burgundica, please go to [http://www.teff.nl/fonts/burgundica/](http://web.archive.org/web/20110413113011/http:/www.teff.nl/fonts/burgundica/ "http://www.teff.nl/fonts/burgundica/") and click the link 'Concept'

For an overview of the Burgundica family, go to [http://www.teff.nl/fonts/burgundica/](http://web.archive.org/web/20110413113011/http:/www.teff.nl/fonts/burgundica/ "http://www.teff.nl/fonts/burgundica/")  
If you prefer printed samples, you can download an A3 sample page (600 dpi) at [http://www.teff.nl/fonts/samplesheets.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20110413113011/http:/www.teff.nl/fonts/samplesheets.html "http://www.teff.nl/fonts/samplesheets.html") or make a request for (free) 1200 dpi samples at: [http://www.teff.nl/fonts/vouwvel\_form.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20110413113011/http:/www.teff.nl/fonts/vouwvel_form.html "http://www.teff.nl/fonts/vouwvel\_form.html") which will be sent by regular post. Delivery may take up to three weeks.

The Burgundica fonts come with:  
- alternate characters for r and s, dieresis and umlaut  
- with automatic selection of the correct r (optional)  
- typographic features:  
  automatic ligatures  
  dieresis or umlaut  
  long or short s  
- unicode support  
- cross platform compatibility  
Note: Technical restrictions apply to the Type 1 format.

To immediate download the fonts, go to: [http://store.esellerate.net/teff/store](http://web.archive.org/web/20110413113011/http:/store.esellerate.net/teff/store "http://store.esellerate.net/teff/store")

For offline orders go to: [http://www.teff.nl/fonts/burgundica/fonts\_form\_burgundica.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20110413113011/http:/www.teff.nl/fonts/burgundica/fonts_form_burgundica.html "http://www.teff.nl/fonts/burgundica/fonts\_form\_burgundica.html") or send an email to [info@teff.nl](mailto:info@teff.nl)
